<a id="Marker3D"></a>

# Marker3D

**Inherits:** [Node3D](Node3D.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Generic 3D position hint for editing.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Generic 3D position hint for editing. It's just like a plain [Node3D](Node3D.md), but it displays as a cross in the 3D editor at all times.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->
